original_text: If you do that, everyone in the world will see that you belong to the Lord. They will respect you with fear.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 백성이 여호와의 이름이 너를 위하여 불리는 것을 보고 너를 두려워하리라

sentences.original_text: will see that you belong to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 주님께 속한 것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will respect you with fear
